alert.note: Alert for Northern Bristol; Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 29 at 3:40PM EST until January 30 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Western Plymouth MA, Northern Bristol MA, Southern Bristol MA and Southern Plymouth MA Counties. * WHEN...Until midnight EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Bristol; Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth; Western Plymouth
